org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block

Class BlockGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.Block
        • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block.BlockGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.util.IItemProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>, IBlockGui

    public abstract class BlockGui
extends net.minecraft.block.Block
implements IBlockGui
    Block with a gui. Implement Block.getContainer(BlockState, World, BlockPos) to specify the gui. Optionally implement IBlockGui.getOpenStat() to specify a stat on gui opening.
